title: The Awkward Exes Table
description: The bride’s divorced parents are both invited. They will be polite... as long as they’re not sitting next to each other.
clues: Hannah and Chris sit together at the very centre of the top table.
Julia refuses to sit directly next to Mark, but she insists on being on Hannah’s side of the table.
Mark demands the far right end of the top table so he can make a dramatic speech.
Chloe (the stepmum) sits directly beside Mark at the top table.
Hannah’s brother Ethan wants to be as far from the speeches as possible at the opposite end of the top table.
The Maid of Honour and Best Man sit together at the side table, facing the top table.
hints: Place the bride and partner in the centre first, then put Mum on Hannah’s side.
If Dad is at the far right end and Stepmum must be next to him, they fill the last two seats.
Ethan takes the remaining far-left end, and the side table is for the Maid of Honour and Best Man.
